description: This file defines a login page component for a web application using React. It manages user authentication by handling form inputs, submitting login requests, and redirecting upon success or failure.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component that renders a login form with email, password, and 'Remember me' options, handles login process, and navigation.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handler function for form submission that validates inputs, calls login, and navigates upon success.
